医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
纽约大学朗格尼分校哈森菲尔德儿童医院：儿科心脏病学和心脏手术护理领域的领导者根据本周发布的《美国新闻与世界报道》年度“最佳儿童医院”指南中的全国专科排名，纽约大学朗格尼分校的哈森菲尔德儿童医院在儿科心脏病学和心脏手术护理方面在纽约排名最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Hassenfeld-Childrens-Hospital-at-NYU-Langone-A-leader-in-pediatric-cardiology-and-heart-surgery-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Hassenfeld-Childrens-Hospital-at-NYU-Langone-A-leader-in-pediatric-cardiology-and-heart-surgery-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c630e95-6b02-4551-acc7-de3d8e413932 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:53:23 -0400 Hassenfeld Children's Hospital at NYU Langone: A leader in pediatric cardiology and heart surgery care
UA 研究人员开发出监测虚弱症状的新方法外行人可能会认为“脆弱”只是“软弱”或“脆弱”的同义词。但在医学领域，虚弱是一个特定术语，指的是由于炎症和激素变化等因素，患者缺乏生理储备，或承受压力的能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/UA-researcher-develops-new-method-to-monitor-frailty-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/UA-researcher-develops-new-method-to-monitor-frailty-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e7fda0d-aefa-43c4-a49d-b05fcc075a78 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:50:14 -0400 UA researcher develops new method to monitor frailty symptoms
研究调查了孕产妇监禁对青少年健康风险行为的影响女性是美国惩教机构中增长最快的人口。过去四十年，女性入狱人数增加了 475% 以上，从 1980 年的 26,326 人增加到 2020 年的 152,854 人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-examines-impact-of-maternal-incarceration-on-health-risk-behaviors-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-examines-impact-of-maternal-incarceration-on-health-risk-behaviors-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44f4c163-0394-4a5e-b792-2c475829d0e2 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:46:52 -0400 Study examines impact of maternal incarceration on health risk behaviors in adolescents
AMA 呼吁采取新方法解决体重问题，BMI 受到批评体重指数作为衡量健康或不健康体重的标准，再次受到质疑，美国医学会建议医生在患者护理中淡化体重指数，并采用其他方法来解决体重问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/BMI-under-fire-as-AMA-calls-for-new-approach-to-address-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/BMI-under-fire-as-AMA-calls-for-new-approach-to-address-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06adbbbd-fce7-4f25-a1b3-3bdb3ecc67c3 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:42:37 -0400 BMI under fire as AMA calls for new approach to address weight
斯坦福大学和 Intonation 合作开发神经内分泌肿瘤的新疗法斯坦福大学创新药物加速器 (IMA) 和 Intonation 研究实验室 (Intonation) 合作开发针对癌性神经内分泌肿瘤或由激素释放细胞形成的肿瘤的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Stanford-and-Intonation-partner-to-develop-new-treatments-for-neuroendocrine-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Stanford-and-Intonation-partner-to-develop-new-treatments-for-neuroendocrine-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baa95271-44c9-4d9a-acea-b94291697618 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:33:35 -0400 Stanford and Intonation partner to develop new treatments for neuroendocrine tumors
确定了新的抑郁症类别斯坦福大学医学院的科学家进行了一项研究，描述了一种新的抑郁症类型：标记认知生物型-；此类人群占抑郁症患者的 27%，并且常用的抗抑郁药物无法有效治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-category-of-depression-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-category-of-depression-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=691ae00b-74ce-461f-964c-7f884b6d703b Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:31:05 -0400 New category of depression identified
IgA 肾病：肾脏以外的疾病哥伦比亚大学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，常见肾脏疾病的病因可能位于肾脏之外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/IgA-nephropathy-The-disease-that-lies-outside-the-kidney.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/IgA-nephropathy-The-disease-that-lies-outside-the-kidney.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3d6b385-ab47-4709-b466-82295fe324ac Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:28:41 -0400 IgA nephropathy: The disease that lies outside the kidney
单细胞分析揭示免疫细胞标记物和抗肿瘤免疫调节剂B细胞被认为在先天性和适应性免疫中发挥着关键作用，但它们在抗肿瘤免疫中的确切作用仍不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Single-cell-profiling-reveals-immune-cell-marker-and-regulator-of-anti-tumor-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Single-cell-profiling-reveals-immune-cell-marker-and-regulator-of-anti-tumor-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=580cb6a2-a363-439f-9ff7-b4021d69fe0b Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:24:49 -0400 Single-cell profiling reveals immune cell marker and regulator of anti-tumor immunity
Mario Romero-Ortega 被选为亚利桑那大学生物医学工程系主任马里奥·罗梅罗-奥尔特加 (Mario Romero-Ortega) 通过全国范围的选拔被选为亚利桑那大学生物医学工程系主任，从 2023 年秋季学期开始。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Mario-Romero-Ortega-selected-to-head-the-University-of-Arizona-Department-of-Biomedical-Engineering.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Mario-Romero-Ortega-selected-to-head-the-University-of-Arizona-Department-of-Biomedical-Engineering.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8c49dcf-e15b-4633-aef0-6558ccc4b90a Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:09:27 -0400 Mario Romero-Ortega selected to head the University of Arizona Department of Biomedical Engineering
消除癌细胞增殖可能是治愈癌症的关键2023年6月1日，《Oncoscience》（第10卷）发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“治疗后癌细胞重新增殖：机制是什么？” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Elimination-cancer-cell-repopulation-may-be-the-key-to-curing-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Elimination-cancer-cell-repopulation-may-be-the-key-to-curing-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c54562b6-07b7-4039-b0df-e0d5a67a70a8 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:05:56 -0400 Eliminating cancer cell repopulation may be the key to curing cancer
